title: mRNA Vaccines Explained | Guests: Rudy Giuliani & Alan Dershowitz | 6/29/21
description:
Glenn shares a preview of his new special leading up to the Fourth of July, where he’ll read the 1776 Commission's report in its entirety, since the Biden administration didn’t want you to. The NFL says, “Football is gay.” CNN’s Jake Tapper has lost much of his viewership. Dr. Robert Malone comes back to explain what an mRNA vaccine is, the truth about possible side effects, and the ethics behind it. Talk of engineering humans to stop eating meat is floating around. Attorney Rudy Giuliani joins to discuss how New York suspended his license to practice law. Attorney Alan Dershowitz calls in with his thoughts on why the Giuliani case should disturb every lawyer. Stu has an update on the alleged black nationalist who shot a cop.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
